citations.narrative:
The licensee runs a wildlife rehabilitation business. The animals in that business are not regulated under the Animal
Welfare Act. A groundhog is being housed in a room of non-regulated animals that are under the rehabilitation business.
Housing the groundhog near non-regulated rehabilitation animals doesn't ensure the health and well-being of the
groundhog. The groundhog must be housed near the rehabilitation animals so that the health and well-being of the
groundhog is not compromised. Correct starting on 6/10/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.133 
   
Separation. 
The licensee runs a wildlife rehabilitation business. The animals in that business are not regulated under the Animal 
Welfare Act. A groundhog is being housed in a room of non-regulated animals that are under the rehabilitation business. 
Housing the groundhog near non-regulated rehabilitation animals doesn't ensure the health and well-being of the 
groundhog. The groundhog must be housed near the rehabilitation animals so that the health and well-being of the 
groundhog is not compromised. Correct starting on 6/10/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
